content: {A生气}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I have something really important to tell you. Daikabutomaru... it... it...

content: If I hadn't eaten the <style=Highlight>{食物}</style> you gave me, I wouldn't have recovered my strength and found Daikabutomaru so quickly.

content: I'd like to leave this <ruby:green flat-horned leaf beetle>Green Flat-Horned Kabutomaru</ruby> with you for training. I hope you like it as much as I do!
